Html:
Everything works great. The following is a minor wrinkle

After unbundling, there is only one item in the product, but the 133 is kept from the orginal document which had 133 items.

- <CTT>
      CTT01>133</CTT01>
</CTT>

There really isn't an automated way that I can fix this since the transaction total is defined differently for each specification.

The SE, GE and IEA segment totals are updated automatically when unbundling because these always behave the same way.

The CTT can have item and dollar amount totals which the parser will not attempt to recalculate. These would need to be a feature of the application that is unbundling.
